Uses of Interface
org.togglz.core.spi.FeatureManagerProvider

  • Packages that use FeatureManagerProvider 
    Package Description
    org.togglz.core.context  
    org.togglz.testing  
    org.togglz.testing.fallback  

    • Uses of FeatureManagerProvider in org.togglz.core.context

      Classes in org.togglz.core.context that implement FeatureManagerProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BeanFinderFeatureManagerProvider
      FeatureManagerProvider that uses the BeanFinder SPI to lookup the FeatureManager.
      class  ContextClassLoaderFeatureManagerProvider
      This implementation of FeatureManagerProvider stores one FeatureManager for each context class loader.
      class  JNDIFeatureManagerProvider
      Implementation of FeatureManagerProvider that tries to look up a FeatureManager from JNDI using the name java:/comp/env/FeatureManager.
      class  StaticFeatureManagerProvider
      Implementation of FeatureManagerProvider for Java SE applications.
      class  ThreadLocalFeatureManagerProvider
      This implementation of FeatureManagerProvider allows to store the FeatureManager in a ThreadLocal for the current thread.

    • Uses of FeatureManagerProvider in org.togglz.testing

      Classes in org.togglz.testing that implement FeatureManagerProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TestFeatureManagerProvider
      This FeatureManagerProvider is used by the testing integration modules to provide a FeatureManager in unit tests.

    • Uses of FeatureManagerProvider in org.togglz.testing.fallback

      Classes in org.togglz.testing.fallback that implement FeatureManagerProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FallbackTestFeatureManagerProvider
      This FeatureManagerProvider is a fallback for unit tests.
